Address.value: 276 FIFTH AVENUE SUITE 505, NEW YORK, New York, 10001, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aspen Group Inc is an education technology holding company that leverages its infrastructure and expertise to allow its two universities, Aspen University and United States University, to deliver on the vision of making college affordable again. Its only segment is the educational delivery operation using a core infrastructure that serves the curriculum and educational delivery needs of its online and campus students regardless of geography.
